Question & Options:

Options:

B. B. Bong Joon-ho directed both 'Parasite' and 'The Housemaid'.
C. C. 'Parasite' explores themes of class struggle similar to 'The Housemaid'.
D. D. 'The Housemaid' was cited as an influence on Bong Joon-ho's film 'Okja'.
Correct Answer: A, C, D
